content.text:
# Beyond Culture

Beyond Culture is a 1976 book by the American anthropologist Edward T. Hall.
High vs. low context culture
Extension transference
Notes
External links
* [https://web.archive.org/web/20080513022307/http://www.ishkbooks.com/hall.pdf The Grip of Culture: Edward T. Hall] - a faithful synopsis by Sergio Missana covering:
** The Silent Language (1959)
** The Hidden Dimension (1966)
** Beyond Culture (1976)
* Everett M. Rogers, William B. Hart, and Yoshitaka Miike (2002), [http://www.mediacom.keio.ac.jp/publication/pdf2002/review24/2.pdf Edward T. Hall and The History of Intercultural Communication: The United States and Japan]
*Gary Huang (1997), [https://web.archive.org/web/20101103145324/http://www.capaa.wa.gov/about/beyondCulture.pdf Beyond Culture: Communicating with Asian American Children and Families] at Teachers College, Columbia University
